Welcome, \nMobiTexter is a Messenger & SMS Texting app \nText from your laptop, mobile and any Android device using your own phone number. \nSend and receive text on the laptop/pc/computer browser from http://www.mobitexter.net/ \nFor any queries, get in touch with us at support@mobitexter.net
